alert.note: Alert for Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 4:48PM EDT until May 10 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... West Virginia... Ohio River At Point Pleasant affecting Gallia and Mason Counties. For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River At Point Pleasant. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 41.0 feet, The Addison, Blaville Road in Ohio is flooded and low lying areas surrounding Point Pleasant and vicinity are flooded due to backwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM EDT Monday the stage was 41.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:00 PM EDT Monday was 41.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 26.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 41.3 feet on 03/07/2008. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 430 AM EDT.
